_comment: Template for certificate layout and styling. All coordinates are in PDF points from bottom-left. Higher Y moves up.

page._comment: A4 portrait by default. Change width/height to switch orientation or page size.

colors._comment: Hex colors used across the certificate.
colors.subtitle: #54668F

background._comment: Soft glow ellipses in the background.

leftGlow._comment: Left pastel glow. x/y = center, xScale/yScale = radius-like size, opacity 0-1.

symbol._comment: Top icon/logo symbol. file can be a public asset filename (example: GlassLogo3.png) or full URL.

wordmark._comment: GLASS lettering under symbol. file can be a public asset filename or full URL.

fallback._comment: Used if logo image fails to load.

heading._comment: Main title/subtitle text positions and sizes.

labName._comment: Lab name block (auto-resizes/wraps for long names).

signatures._comment: Bottom signature area for lab and GLASS signer.

footer._comment: Small line at the very bottom.
footer.text: Issued by GLASS for trusted collaboration visibility across verified labs.
